name: Stairway to Heaven's Gate
description:
This is a thrilling parkour game where you take the role of a lost soul. Run, jump, keep climbing up and run up the stairway to heaven's gate before you disperse and disappear. Your journey is fraught with dangers. All kinds of trap and obstacles are trying to plunge you into the abyss! Try to collect as many coins as you can, which you can use to buy items that help you break through the barriers. If you can get enough coins continuously, you will get a extra bonus.

Features:
  • Fast-paced 3D parkour game
  • Variety of elaborately designed traps and obstacles
  • Challenging levels
  • Support two players racing in split-screen mode (need gamepad)
  • Steam achievements and leaderboards
